function ERI_EP04_17()
    --.転-3【12月第2週】「センスの壁」
    SaveData.Title = "センスの壁"

    --//BG:1-A教室（夕方）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG014ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

    MSG([[ When it was less than two weeks until the Princess Election with Daria-san, we finally received confirmation of the appeal theme. ]])
    --//BU：ヒユ（焦り）、リラ（真剣）、ウラン（悲しみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ga")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ba")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(60,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0508.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "So the theme is 'martial arts,' huh. No wonder the enemy seems so confident." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0318.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "I-if the theme is 'martial arts,' that means two people grapple together, right...? Like how Erika Onee-sama always practices after school?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0335.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Yes, striking techniques are forbidden. Within the scope of a maiden’s refinement, it will be about graceful techniques to protect oneself." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0336.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Even if the rules don't prohibit it, rough behavior on that stage is not encouraged. After all, it is a contest of beauty." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1146.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "For someone like me who’s good at kicking techniques... it’s a disadvantageous rule." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ It was something I'd been taught before, but having it pointed out again made the rule seem even harsher. ]])

    MSG([[ Only chokeholds and throws are allowed. Using familiar tools, which the Ikusa-style arrest techniques specialize in, would surely be discouraged. ]])

    MSG([[ It would ultimately be about pure skill level and the beauty of the techniques. ]])

    MSG([[ And speaking of that, there was no doubt Daria-san was many steps ahead of me. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1147.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "If there’s any point I can exploit, it’s that Daria-san hasn’t taken any action at all yet." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1148.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I will keep training as I am and absolutely outmaneuver Daria-san on the day of the event." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0509.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Y-yeah, I’m rooting for you, though." ]])

    MSG([[ At my words, Lira and the others showed an unusual, subtle reaction. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0510.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Don’t push yourself too hard. Lately, you’re trying so much, it worries me." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0337.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Please tell us if there’s anything we can do. We are allies of Erika-san, after all." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0319.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "You’ve been training late every day recently, so I’m worried you might collapse again!" ]])

    MSG([[ The kindness of everyone who worried about me, like Akira did the other day, truly touched my heart. ]])

    MSG([[ I felt guilty for causing such worry. But of course, there was no way I could say I was planning to confess my lie to everyone if I won the Princess Election against Daria-san. ]])

    MSG([[ This was a problem I had to face alone. Until the day I can confess, I would keep my words of apology to myself. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1149.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Thank you, but I’m fine. I just can’t stay still as a martial artist—I want to be able to deal with Daria-san’s techniques as soon as possible." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ The three gave me wry smiles, but their expressions still showed worry. ]])

    MSG([[ I thought I had to work even harder, find a way to defeat Daria-san, and put them at ease. ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ But— ]])
    --//CG：武術の修行（構え・傷だらけ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV022ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM10.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1150.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Guhhh!?!" ]])
    --//SE：床に叩きつけられる音（ﾀﾞｧﾝｯ！）
PLAY_SE("SEc026.wav")
WAIT(200)

    --//BG：黒バック
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask031" , 300,false)

    --//effect：明滅
LAYER_LOAD(80,"BG000ab")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_LOAD(80,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",50,false)
LAYER_LOAD(80,"BG000ab")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(80,0,800,Ease.InCubic)
WAIT(800)

    MSG([[ No matter how many days I trained with the Aikido teacher, no progress was seen. ]])

    MSG([[ I fell face-first onto the tatami mats—too many times to count—and as I felt the smell of the mats and the pain on my face, I realized my lack of talent. ]])

    MSG([[ But not yet. I can’t give up yet. ]])

    MSG([[ Moving my numb limbs through the pain, I forced myself to stand up and got back into stance. ]])

    --//CG：武術の修行（構え・傷だらけ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV022ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1151.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "O-one more time, please!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("aikidoist_0005.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Aikido master】
 "...No, today’s training is over." ]])

    MSG([[ The teacher sighed in exasperation and, without waiting for my reply, began untying his gi belt. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("aikidoist_0006.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Aikido master】
 "You understand it yourself, right? What you lack is not technique. It’s the sense to feel the opponent’s center of gravity on your skin and respond immediately." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("aikidoist_0007.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Aikido master】
 "Since I can’t teach that sense, continuing like this is pointless. Let next week’s training be the last." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("aikidoist_0008.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Aikido master】
 "If you can’t beat me then, I won’t insist. Withdrawing from the match would be wiser." ]])

    MSG([[ Having said that, the teacher quickly left the dojo. ]])

    --//CG：武術の修行（悲しみ・傷だらけ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV022ae")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

    MSG([[ His overly indifferent reaction left me stunned in stance. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1152.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Sense... huh." ]])

    MSG([[ A bitter taste spread in my mouth. Not the blood from biting my tongue, but the taste of frustration toward my own helplessness. ]])

    MSG([[ I knew I didn’t have talent. ]])

--;吉★　テキスト修正「覚えるのにせ」→「覚えるのに」（2020/02/01 19:36）
    MSG([[ I was an average person who took almost until finishing compulsory education to learn a skill Marika-onee-san had mastered at ten. ]])

    MSG([[ No matter how desperately an average person tries, expecting to gain techniques to defeat a superior opponent in less than a month was hopeless from the start. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1153.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Maybe... it’s impossible for me." ]])

    MSG([[ The words of Lira and the others who worried and rushed to me didn’t reach my head at all. ]])

    MSG([[ The wall of sense. Faced with the cruel, inevitable reality for an average person, I completely lost my confidence. ]])
    --　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERI_EP04_18")
end
